resources.string: When you click on the button below, you will send an ordered broadcast. \ The matching receivers will display toast messages.
Access this permission even though it might make your phone go KABOOM

string-array.name: Quotes
string-array.item: Now cracks a noble heart. Good-night, sweet prince: And flights of angels sing thee to thy rest.
As flies to wanton boys, are we to th\' gods. They kill us for their sport.
There is a tide in the affairs of men, which taken at the flood, leads on to fortune. Omitted, all the voyage of their life is bound in shallows and in miseries.
The first thing we do, let\'s kill all the lawyers.
A horse! a horse! my kingdom for a horse.
